message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even considering this price.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. That's a bit too high for me right now. I'd be willing to pay $8,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your position, $8,000 is significantly below its value.  Could you consider something closer to $13,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  While $13,000 is closer to what I had in mind, it's still a bit above my budget. Would you consider $9,500?
Hi Bob, you're getting closer!  I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about $11,500?
Hi Alice, thanks for your flexibility.  I could meet you halfway between our last two offers.  How does $10,500 sound?
